nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Contact! Movement on the walls, ceiling! They're all around us! It's an ambush!

choices.text: [Athletics] Fall back to that narrow passage we passed!
[Use Beast Repellent] Kim, use the repellent now!
[Previous Loop] "There are six of them. Two from the ceiling, four from the sides. Focus fire on the ceiling first."

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The jungle erupts in a flurry of claws and teeth. The fight begins.

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: We made it! The passage is narrow enough that they can only come at us one at a time. We have the advantage now!

nodes.speaker: first_officer_torres
nodes.text: Kim stumbled! They're surrounded! We have to go back for them!

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: The repellent is working! The creatures are recoiling, confused! They're keeping their distance.

choices.text: Press the attack while they're disoriented.
This is our chance. Let's get to the ruins, now!

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have engaged the beasts of the jungle.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You successfully used your wits to avoid a fight and escape to the ruins.
